title: Serious herb cheese spread
ingredients: ['1 (200g) tub cream cheese, softened', '2 cloves garlic', '3 spring onions, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon mustard', '1/2 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '4 tablesppons chopped fresh parsley', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh dill', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '4 tablespoons chopped black olives', '2 tablespoons lemon juice']
